name: miauth
description: The authentication pluggable service that will make you purr

scripts.dev: SALT=10 JWT_EXP_OFFSET=86400 JWT_SECRET=m14uth PORT=5001 REDIS_PASSWORD=put_here_your_long_password REDIS_HOST=127.0.0.1 REDIS_PORT=6379 REDIS_DB=0 node app.js
scripts.test: SALT=10 JWT_EXP_OFFSET=86400 JWT_SECRET=m14uth PORT=5001 REDIS_PASSWORD=put_here_your_long_password REDIS_HOST=127.0.0.1 REDIS_PORT=6379 REDIS_DB=0 ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine

author: anargu
